issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Debug segfault in dataset writing on 32-bit mingw (RTools 35)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9651](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9651). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Followup to ARROW-8002, which skipped the dataset writing tests on windows.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9651?focusedCommentId=17422181) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Datasets are disabled on rtools 35 32-bit in ARROW-12216
